sourceDesc.p: TEI-page files converted by Python to TEI-entry file

div.p: SEGUE, in the Italian muhc, is often found before aria, alleluja, amen, & c. to ſhow that thoſe portions or parts are to be ſung immediately after the laſt note of that part over which it is writ; but if theſe words si placet, or ad libitum, are joined therewith, it ſignifies, that theſe portions may be ſung or not at pleaſure.
